name: OcUK Forum - Darkness (xenforo)
description: Dark styled theme for Overclockers UK xenforo powered forums
additional_info:
Features:

* darker colours
* no base64 images
* Overclockers UK logo
* default read/unread icons
* bigger vibrant buttons for specific actions
* alternating backgrounds on viewing forums
* fixes to redactor editor styling
* square avatars
* new green site notices
* quickpost restyled & centered
* more defined posts view

---

As the basis of this comes from the OcUK community, thanks goes to all the people involved in the idea & tweaks to the style. (RoyMi6, Scottland, I'm fairly sure the answer is no, wiiija)



Based on (OcUK Forum - XEN - Complete)

Tweaks & Ideas thread:
https://forums.overclockers.co.uk/threads/the-ocuk-new-stylish-themes-thread-2017.18769736
